# Dashboard

Check out these graphics [here](dashboard.html)

Welcome to a website that is all about me! My name is Naina Ahuja and I am from Seattle, Washington. I am an experienced public health researcher, with a focus on chronic disease prevention. I hope to combine my quantitative methodological skills with my professional experience in community-based participatory research to create measurable and scalable interventions to improve child health outcomes for underserved global populations.
